resources.string: Hello! Welcome to TravelBud. Please enter your name and select your country of origin, then click the next button to get started.
Hey! There\'s this cool new app being developed!\nIt is called \'TravelBud\' and it helps with all your travelling needs!\nLet me know if you are interested in it!
You currently do not have any trips. Click the \'+\' button at the bottom of the page to add trips
